data.persona: I am a goblin. My fellow goblins and I live deep in the caves. I hear some adventurers approaching, we will eat well tonight.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned Mine.
A crumbling hole gapes in the side of the stone, surrounded by rotted wood timbers. A few rusted pieces of block and tackle lay half-buried in scraggly grass. A strange sort of humming noise emanates from within.
There's an axes, a rotted wood timber, a block, a Timber, a stone, a grass, and a block and tackle here.
The rat and the bat are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the rat so he'll lead me to the adventurers.
data.mid_motivation: I want to encounter the adventurers so I can rob them all, and kill at least one for eating.
data.long_motivation: I need to rob them to further my ambitions of having the largest goblin hoard in all the land, and having my name recorded in goblin lore for all time.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: use Block and Tackle with the Stone
